Zuckerberg: No plans to step down as chairman 6:47 AM ET Wed, 21 Nov 2018 | 01:26

Mark Zuckerberg said he will keep his role as chairman of Facebook's board.
During the CNN interview, Zuckerberg was asked whether he would step down as chairman of Facebook's board.
Zuckerberg has voting control over the board, meaning he could not be ousted.
"I'm not currently thinking that that makes sense," Zuckerberg told CNN.
He made his comments in a CNN interview that aired Tuesday night.
Since the report, many have questioned Zuckerberg's leadership.
